AI Description: r-maptools is an R package that provides various tools for reading and handling spatial data in R. It offers functions to read, write, and manipulate spatial data formats commonly used in geographic information systems (GIS).
Core Features: Read & Write Spatial Data In Various Formats (Shapefiles, Kml, Geojson, Etc.), Perform Spatial Data Manipulations & Transformations, Overlay Spatial Data Layers & Conduct Spatial Operations, Visualize Spatial Data & Create Maps
General Tags: R Package, Spatial Data Handling, Geographic Information Systems (Gis), Data Visualization
